channel.title: [639] Dementhium - Poison Help
channel.description: When certain bosses, such as KBD and a few other custom bosses, use their poison attack, super antipoison doesnt do anything. What I mean by this, is if the boss uses the poison attack, the player can cure themself by drinking super anti, but then they are able to be instantly re-poisoned. I want to make it where they can't be poisoned again for a short period of time. -Thanks in advance
